alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Charles City; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Henrico; Gloucester; Greensville; Isle of Wight; James City; Lunenburg; Mathews; Mecklenburg; New Kent; Newport News; Prince George; Southampton; Surry; Sussex; Western Chesterfield; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 4:48AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHAMPTON...NORTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...SUSSEX...DINWIDDIE...SOUTHEASTERN CHESTERFIELD...SOUTHEASTERN MECKLENBURG...CHARLES CITY...PRINCE GEORGE...SOUTHEASTERN NEW KENT... CENTRAL MATHEWS...SOUTHEASTERN HENRICO...GREENSVILLE...SOUTHAMPTON... NORTHWESTERN YORK...JAMES CITY...GLOUCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN LUNENBURG...SURRY AND BRUNSWICK COUNTIES...THE CITY OF PETERSBURG... THE NORTHERN CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS...THE CITY OF COLONIAL HEIGHTS... THE CITY OF HOPEWELL...THE CITY OF EMPORIA AND THE CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG THROUGH 545 AM EST... At 447 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Jordans Point to near Ebony. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A gust to 36 mph was also observed in South Hill. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Petersburg, Hopewell, Purdy, Fort Gregg-Adams, Prince George, Jordans Point, Garysville, Gasburg, Radium, and Carson around 450 AM EST. Charles City, Disputanta, Stony Creek, Barley, Ruthville, and Adkins Store around 455 AM EST. Emporia, Jarratt, and Burrowsville around 500 AM EST. Holdcroft around 505 AM EST. Claremont, Sussex, Gaston, Green Plain, Cabin Point, and Rustic around 510 AM EST. Waverly, Toano, Dahlia, Claresville, and Homeville around 515 AM EST. Norge around 520 AM EST. Williamsburg, Seaboard, and Dendron around 525 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Bacons Fork, Vicksville, Pons, Grizzard, Croaker, Lackey, Gum Forks, Moon, Wayside, and Camp Peary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
